import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { TranslationService } from "src/app/services/translation.service"; @Component({ selector: "app-footer", templateUrl: "./footer.component.html", styleUrls: ["./footer.component.css"], }) export class FooterComponent { currentLang: string = "en"; constructor(public translationService: TranslationService) {} public setLang(lang: string) { this.translationService.setLang(lang); this.currentLang = lang; } public getSupportedLanguages() { return this.translationService.supportedLanguages; } }
